verses.t: Therefore{G3767} being justified{G1344} by{G1537} faith{G4102}, we have{G2192} peace{G1515} with{G4314} God{G3588} through{G1223} our{G2257} Lord{G3588} Jesus{G2424} Christ{G5547}:

By{G1223} whom{G3739} also{G2532} we have{G2192} access{G3588} by faith{G3588} into{G1519} this{G3778} grace{G3588} wherein{G1722} we stand{G2476}, and{G2532} rejoice{G2744} in{G1909} hope{G1680} of the glory{G3588}of God{G3588}.
And{G1161} not{G3756} only{G3440} so, but{G235} we glory{G2744} in{G1722} tribulations{G3588} also{G2532}: knowing{G1492} that{G3754} tribulation{G3588} worketh{G2716} patience{G5281};
And{G1161} patience{G5281}, experience{G1382}; and{G1161} experience{G1382}, hope{G1680}:

And{G1161} hope{G1680} maketh{G2617} not{G3756} ashamed{G2617}; because{G3754} the love{G3588} of God{G3588} is shed abroad{G1632} in{G1722} our{G2257} hearts{G3588} by{G1223} the{G4151} Holy{G40} Ghost{G4151} which is given{G1325} unto us{G2254}.
For{G1063} when{G5607} we{G2257} were{G5607} yet{G2089} without strength{G772}, in due{G2596} time{G2540} Christ{G5547} died{G599} for{G5228} the ungodly{G765}.

For{G1063} scarcely{G3433} for{G5228} a righteous man{G1342} will{G599} one{G5100} die{G599}: yet{G1063} peradventure{G5029} for{G5228} a good man{G18} some{G5100} would{G5111} even{G2532} dare{G5111} to die{G599}.

But{G1161} God{G3588} commendeth{G4921} his{G1438} love{G26} toward{G1519} us{G2248}, in that{G3754}, while{G5607} we{G2257} were{G5607} yet{G2089} sinners{G268}, Christ{G5547} died{G599} for{G5228} us{G2257}.
Much{G4183} more{G3123} then{G3767}, being{G1344} now{G3568} justified{G1344} by{G1722} his{G846} blood{G3588}, we shall be saved{G4982} from{G575} wrath{G3588} through{G1223} him{G846}.

For{G1063} if{G1487}, when we were{G5607} enemies{G2190}, we were reconciled{G2644} to God{G3588} by{G1223} the death{G3588} of his{G846} Son{G3588}, much{G4183} more{G3123}, being reconciled{G2644}, we shall be saved{G4982} by{G1722} his{G846} life{G3588}.

And{G1161} not{G3756} only{G3440} so, but{G235} we{G2744} also{G2532} joy{G2744} in{G1722} God{G3588} through{G1223} our{G2257} Lord{G3588} Jesus{G2424} Christ{G5547}, by{G1223} whom{G3739} we have{G2983} now{G3568} received{G2983} the atonement{G3588}.

Wherefore{G1223}, as{G5618} by{G1223} one{G1520} man{G444} sin{G3588} entered{G1525} into{G1519} the world{G3588}, and{G2532} death{G3588} by{G1223} sin{G3588}; and{G2532} so{G3779} death{G3588} passed{G1330} upon{G1519} all{G3956} men{G444}, for{G1909} that{G3739} all{G3956} have sinned{G264}:
(For{G1063} until{G891} the law{G3551} sin{G266} was{G2258} in{G1722} the world{G2889}: but{G1161} sin{G266} is{G1677} not{G3756} imputed{G1677} when there is{G5607} no{G3361} law{G3551}.

Nevertheless{G235} death{G3588} reigned{G936} from{G575} Adam{G76} to{G3360} Moses{G3475}, even{G2532} over{G1909} them that had{G264} not{G3361} sinned{G264} after{G1909} the similitude{G3588} of{G3588} Adam's{G76} transgression{G3847}, who{G3739} is{G2076} the figure{G5179} of him that was to come{G3195}.

But{G235} not{G3756} as{G5613} the offence{G3588}, so{G3779} also{G2532} is the free gift{G3588}. For{G1063} if{G1487} through the offence{G3900} of one{G1520} many{G4183} be dead{G599}, much{G4183} more{G3123} the grace{G3588} of God{G3588}, and{G2532} the gift{G3588} by{G1722} grace{G5485}, which is by one{G1520} man{G444}, Jesus{G2424} Christ{G5547}, hath abounded{G4052} unto{G1519} many{G4183}.

And{G2532} not{G3756} as{G5613} it was by{G1223} one{G1520} that sinned{G264}, so is the gift{G3588}: for{G1063} the judgment{G2917} was by{G1537} one{G1520} to{G1519} condemnation{G2631}, but{G1161} the free gift{G5486} is of{G1537} many{G4183} offences{G3900} unto{G1519} justification{G1345}.

Therefore{G686} as{G5613} by{G1223} the offence{G3900} of one{G1520} judgment came upon{G1519} all{G3956} men{G444} to{G1519} condemnation{G2631}; even{G2532} so{G3779} by{G1223} the righteousness{G1345} of one{G1520} the free gift came upon{G1519} all{G3956} men{G444} unto{G1519} justification{G1347} of life{G2222}.
